author: pace
title: PACE: Community credentials 2
description: There is a lack of bottoms up community focussed credentials that help with both the adoption and education of Atala PRISM
solution: Community project based learning exercises for a bottoms up approach to implementing, learning about and using verifiable credentials
experience: PACE team funded from fund 6 Atala PRISM challenge, Gimbalabs community for project based learning and Atala PRISM pioneer contributors
